items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful casual holiday dress
items.body: LOVE it! Super soft and fits exactly as expected per the sizing chart. HOWEVER, this is NOT a mini in any way unless you scrunch it up around your waist and hips making it rouched (for reference I'm 5'1", 100 lbs. 32"x24"x34" and ordered a small). I love the dark gray color and I love the material and how it fits - I'm not mad about the length to be honest because for me it looks like a midi and works. The material is great and the stretch is there so it helps keep the fitted shape. I will say it seems like the thickness of the material wouldn't be very warm (it's fairly thin) in a cold climate but in 60-70 degrees with a wrap or boots it's great. Also, it is pretty sheer so unless you are wearing a dark color and maybe some sort of form-fitting undergarment you will definitely be able to see through it - it shows everything and every bump so be warned. Read more
items.author: promogal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for cool weather
items.body: Love it! The material is so soft and the color is beautiful.Its the perfect length to pair with some thigh high boots ! Its a little sheer but nothing that some dark undergarments or shapeware cant take care of! Read more
items.author: Desi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shaper outline does show through a little.
items.body: What a cute sweater dress! I love the color and how this dress fits me, and although the material is quite thin, it definitely keeps me cozy and warm. Now, I will always wear a full body shaper and a nice pair of silky and shiny nude pantyhose with all of my dresses, and this dress does show the outline of my body shaper, since it fits snugly, but it isn't that bad. I actually like that it shows through just a little. This is just a fun dress to wear for the day or for a night out, matched with shiny pantyhose and, of course, a sexy pair of high heeled ankle boots. Read more
items.author: Lenny S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
items.body: Cute, comfortable and you can dress it up or down. I am between a xl and xxl and snagged a xxl and it was perfect but slightly loose. Warm and comfortable, it was longer than what the pictures portray but still good. If it between sizes I would go with your smaller size bc the dress does have stretch to it. Read more
items.author: Felicia Luchkiw

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fit
items.body: Definitely not like the picture. Had a weird uncomfortable fit and it is see through. Quality seems very cheap. I got a size small and it was tight around the neck Read more
items.author: Lorena

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size down for the length
items.body: I’m 5’5 and this dress is down to my knees. Definitely not short. It’s clings to the body and is soft. I recommend wearing a shaper if you don’t already have that hour glass shape. It shows every little roll/crease Read more
items.author: kelli

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite little black dress !
items.body: Ive had this dress for a few months now and I can say I'm obsessed!! Can dress this up or down, and it hugs my curves very nicely. It's a bit thin but not see through! Very stretchy as well, I don't feel suffocated and that's usually my biggest issues with skin hugging dresses like these! The color has also stayed dark despite many washes. Very versatile piece, I'm in love with it! Worth every penny in my opinion!! Read more
items.author: T.F.

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Dress needs a revamp, they missed the mark
items.body: Wanted to love this dress, liked the style with the gray stripe on the chest area. I ordered a medium and could hardly get the dress over my head. The size issue was getting the waist part over my chest and the neck hole is really snug too. I'm 5'4", 142 lbs., with a normal sized head lol. For it being 4% spandex/elastene, it was not stretchy overall. The stripe does not carry over to the back of the dress either and the dress was too long. Just unflattering everywhere unfortunately. Read more
items.author: sf81az

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, 92-red, 92-green, Black, Orange, Red, Rose Red, 91-green, 92-blue, 92-grey, Khaki, Pink, 92-black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
